description: Try our easy to follow Hot Honeyed Carrots recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hot Honeyed Carrots Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove cover, bring to the boil and cook for about 8 minutes until liquid has evaporated and carrots are golden and caramelised, turning occasionally. Alternatively to roast, toss carrots in melted butter and honey, add herbs (as above) and season to taste. Roast at 210°C for 20-25 minutes or until browned and tender. Serve with any juices poured over.
